glyphs.name: Glyph of Frenzied Regeneration
glyphs.description: For 6 sec after activating Frenzied Regeneration, healing effects on you are 40% more powerful.  However, your Frenzied Regeneration now always costs 50 Rage and no longer converts Rage into health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Maul
glyphs.description: Your Maul ability now hits 1 additional target for 50% damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Omens
glyphs.description: While you are not in an Eclipse, the following abilities now grant 10 Solar or Lunar Energy: Entangling Roots, Cyclone, Faerie Fire, Faerie Swarm, Mass Entanglement, Typhoon, Disorienting Roar, Ursol's Vortex, and Mighty Bash.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Stag
glyphs.description: Your Travel Form can now be used as a mount by party members.  This glyph is disabled while Glyph of the Cheetah is active.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shred
glyphs.description: While Berserk or Tiger's Fury is active, Shred has no positional requirement.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Prowl
glyphs.description: Reduces the movement penalty of Prowl by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Pounce
glyphs.description: Increases the range of your Pounce by 8 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Stampede
glyphs.description: You can now cast Stampeding Roar without being in Bear Form or Cat Form.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Innervate
glyphs.description: When Innervate is cast on a target other than the caster, both the caster and target will benefit, but at 40% reduced effect.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Rebirth
glyphs.description: Players resurrected by Rebirth are returned to life with 100% health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Regrowth
glyphs.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Regrowth by 40%, but removes the periodic component of the spell.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Rejuvenation
glyphs.description: When you have Rejuvenation active on three or more targets, the cast time of your Nourish spell is reduced by 30%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Healing Touch
glyphs.description: When you cast Healing Touch, the cooldown on your Nature's Swiftness is reduced by 3 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Guided Stars
glyphs.description: Your Starfall only hits targets affected by your Moonfire or Sunfire.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Orca
glyphs.description: Your Aquatic Form now appears as an Orca.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hurricane
glyphs.description: Your Hurricane and Astral Storm abilities now also slow the movement speed of their victims by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Skull Bash
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of your Skull Bash interrupt by 2 sec, but increases the cooldown by 5 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Nature's Grasp
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of Nature's Grasp by 45 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Savagery
glyphs.description: Savage Roar can now be used with 0 combo points, resulting in a 12 sec duration.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Entangling Roots
glyphs.description: Reduces the cast time of your Entangling Roots by 0.2 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Double Jeopardy
glyphs.description: Judging a target increases the damage of your next Judgment by 20%, but only if used on a different second target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Devotion Aura
glyphs.description: Devotion Aura no longer affects party or raid members, but the cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Holy Wrath
glyphs.description: Your Holy Wrath now also stuns Elementals, Dragonkin, and Aberrations.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Divine Protection
glyphs.description: Reduces the magical damage reduction of your Divine Protection to 20% but adds 20% physical damage reduction.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Templar's Verdict
glyphs.description: You take 10% less damage for 6 sec after dealing damage with Templar's Verdict or Exorcism.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Avenging Wrath
glyphs.description: While Avenging Wrath is active, you are healed for 1% of your maximum health every 2 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Consecration
glyphs.description: You can now target Consecration anywhere within 25 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Luminous Charger
glyphs.description: Your Paladin class mounts glow with holy light.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Focused Shield
glyphs.description: Your Avenger's Shield hits 2 fewer targets, but for 30% more damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Burden of Guilt
glyphs.description: Your Judgment hits fill your target with doubt and remorse, reducing movement speed by 50% for 2 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Blinding Light
glyphs.description: Your Blinding Light now knocks down targets for 3 sec instead of Blinding them.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Final Wrath
glyphs.description: Your Holy Wrath does an additional 50% damage to targets with less than 20% health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Word of Glory
glyphs.description: Increases your damage by 3% per Holy Power spent after you cast Word of Glory or Eternal Flame on a friendly target. Lasts 6 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Illumination
glyphs.description: Your Holy Shock criticals grant 1% mana return, but Holy Insight returns 10% less mana.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Harsh Words
glyphs.description:
Your Word of Glory can now also be used on enemy targets, causing Holy damage approximately equal to the amount it would have healed.

Does not work with Eternal Flame.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Divinity
glyphs.description: Increases the cooldown of your Lay on Hands by 2 min but causes it to give you 10% of your maximum mana.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Light of Dawn
glyphs.description: Light of Dawn affects 2 fewer targets, but heals each target for 25% more.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Blessed Life
glyphs.description:
You have a 50% chance to gain a charge of Holy Power whenever you are affected by a Stun, Fear or Immobilize effect.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Water Shield
glyphs.description: Increases the mana generated reactively by your Water Shield when you are attacked by 50%, but reduces the passive mana generation by 15%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Unstable Earth
glyphs.description: Causes your Earthquake spell to also reduce the movement speed of affected targets by 40% for 3 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Chain Lightning
glyphs.description: Your Chain Lightning spell now strikes 2 additional targets, but deals 10% less damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Spirit Walk
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Spirit Walk ability by 25%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Capacitor Totem
glyphs.description: Reduces the charging time of your Capacitor Totem by 2 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Purge
glyphs.description: Your Purge dispels 1 additional Magic effect but has a 6 sec cooldown.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fire Elemental Totem
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown and duration of your Fire Elemental Totem by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fire Nova
glyphs.description: Increases the radius of your Fire Nova spell by 5 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Flame Shock
glyphs.description: When your Flame Shock deals damage, it heals you for 30% of the damage dealt.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Wind Shear
glyphs.description: Increases the school lockout duration of Wind Shear by 1 sec, but also increases the cooldown by 3 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Frost Shock
glyphs.description: Decreases the cooldown incurred by your Frost Shock by 2 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Healing Stream Totem
glyphs.description: When your Healing Stream Totem heals an ally, it also reduces their Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 10% for 6 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Healing Wave
glyphs.description: Your Healing Wave also heals you for 20% of the healing effect when you heal someone else.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Totemic Recall
glyphs.description: Causes your Totemic Recall ability to return the full mana cost of any recalled totems.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Lakestrider
glyphs.description: You automatically gain Water Walking while you are in Ghost Wolf form.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Telluric Currents
glyphs.description: Causes your Lightning Bolt to restore <!--sp123099:0--><!--sp123099--><!--sp112858:0-->10<!--sp112858-->% of your mana when it strikes an enemy.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Grounding Totem
glyphs.description: Instead of absorbing a spell, your Grounding Totem reflects the next harmful spell back at its caster, but the cooldown of your Grounding Totem is increased by 20 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Spiritwalker's Grace
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of your Spiritwalker's Grace by 5 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Lava Lash
glyphs.description: Your Lava Lash ability no longer spreads Flame Shock to nearby targets.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Chaining
glyphs.description: Increases the jump distance of your Chain Heal spell by 100%, but gives the spell a 2 sec cooldown.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Cleansing Waters
glyphs.description: When you dispel a harmful Magic or Curse effect from an ally, you also heal the target for 5% of your maximum health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Circle of Healing
glyphs.description: Your Circle of Healing spell heals 1 additional target, but its mana cost is increased by 35%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Purify
glyphs.description: Your Purify spell also heals your target for 5% of maximum health when you successfully dispel a magical effect or disease.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fade
glyphs.description: Your Fade ability now also reduces all damage taken by 10%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fear Ward
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of Fear Ward by 60 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Inner Sanctum
glyphs.description: Spell damage taken is reduced by 6% while within Inner Fire, and the movement speed bonus of your Inner Will is increased by 6%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Holy Nova
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Holy Nova.

Causes an explosion of holy light around the caster, causing 331.5 Holy damage to all enemy targets within 10 yards and healing up to 5 targets within 10 yards for 525.

Healing is divided among the number of targets healed. These effects cause no threat.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Inner Fire
glyphs.description: Increases the armor gained from your Inner Fire spell by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Deep Wells
glyphs.description: Increases the total amount of charges of your Lightwell by 2.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mass Dispel
glyphs.description: Causes your Mass Dispel to be potent enough to remove Magic effects that are normally undispellable.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Psychic Horror
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Horror by 10 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Holy Fire
glyphs.description: Increases the range of your Holy Fire, Smite, and Power Word: Solace spells by 10 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Weakened Soul
glyphs.description: Reduces the duration of the Weakened Soul effect caused by Power Word: Shield by 2 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Power Word: Shield
glyphs.description: 20% of the absorb from your Power Word: Shield spell is converted into healing.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Spirit of Redemption
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of Spirit of Redemption by 10 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Psychic Scream
glyphs.description: Targets of your Psychic Scream and your Psyfiend's Psychic Terror now tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Renew
glyphs.description: Your Renew heals for 33% more each time it heals, but its duration is reduced by 3 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Scourge Imprisonment
glyphs.description: Reduces the cast time of your Shackle Undead by 1.0 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mind Blast
glyphs.description: When you critically hit with your Mind Blast, you cause the target to be unable to move for 4 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Dispel Magic
glyphs.description: Your Dispel Magic spell also damages your target for <!--pts1:0:0:119856-->767<!----> Holy damage when you successfully dispel a magical effect.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Smite
glyphs.description: Your Smite spell inflicts an additional 20% damage against targets afflicted by [Solace and Insanity: Power Word: Solace / Holy Fire], but that additional damage does not get transferred by Atonement.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Prayer of Mending
glyphs.description: The first charge of your Prayer of Mending heals for an additional 60% but your Prayer of Mending has 1 fewer <!--singular:charge:charges-->charge<!--singular-->.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hand of Gul'dan
glyphs.description: Your Hand of Gul'dan can now be targeted at a location.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Conflagrate
glyphs.description: Conflagrate no longer requires Immolate to snare the target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Siphon Life
glyphs.description: Your [Immolate]Corruption spell will heal you for 0.5% of your maximum health when dealing [Immolate: periodic]damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Verdant Spheres
glyphs.description:
[ Destruction: When you have a Burning Ember, it appears around your character as a Verdant Sphere /

Affliction, Demonology
Your Soul Shards are transformed into Verdant Spheres]

glyphs.name: Glyph of Nightmares
glyphs.description: Your Felsteed and Dreadsteed can cross water while running and leave a trail of flames.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fear
glyphs.description: Your Fear causes the target to tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Felguard
glyphs.description: Your Felguard will equip a random two-handed axe, sword or polearm from your backpack.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Demon Training
glyphs.description:
Improves your demon's special abilities:

Your [Grimoire of Supremacy: Fel Imp / Imp]'s Firebolt cast time is reduced by 50% and fires in bursts of three.

Increases your [Grimoire of Supremacy: Voidlord / Voidwalker]'s total armor by 10%.

Your [Grimoire of Supremacy: Shivarra and Archincubus / Succubus and Incubus]'s [Grimoire of Supremacy: Mesmerizes / Seduction] ability also removes all damage over time effects from the target.

When your [Grimoire of Supremacy: Observer / Felhunter] uses [Grimoire of Supremacy: Clone Magic / Devour Magic], you will also be healed for that amount.

Increases your [Grimoire of Supremacy: Wrathguard / Felguard]'s total health by 20%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Health Funnel
glyphs.description: Your Health Funnel instantly restores 15% of your demon's health, but has a 10 sec. cooldown.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Healthstone
glyphs.description: You receive 100% more healing from using a healthstone, but the health is restored over 10 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Subtlety
glyphs.description: Your Soul Shards no longer display while out of combat.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Curse of the Elements
glyphs.description: Curse of the Elements hits 2 additional nearby targets.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Imp Swarm
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Imp Swarm.
Requires Demonology.

Imp Swarm
Summons 4 Wild Imps from the Twisting Nether to attack the target.

The Wild Imps passive effect is disabled while Imp Swarm is on cooldown. Imp Swarm's cooldown is reduced by spell haste. Also increases Wild Imp's cooldown by 4 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shadow Bolt
glyphs.description: Splits your Shadow Bolt into three smaller attacks.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Soulstone
glyphs.description: Players resurrected by Soulstone are returned to life with 100% health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Carrion Swarm
glyphs.description: Your Carrion Swarm no longer knocks targets back.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Unstable Affliction
glyphs.description: Reduces the cast time of Unstable Affliction by 25%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Falling Meteor
glyphs.description: If you use Demonic Leap while falling, you slam into the ground rapidly and will not die from falling damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Loose Mana
glyphs.description: Your Mana Gem now restores mana over 6 sec, rather than instantly.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Arcane Explosion
glyphs.description: Increases the radius of your Arcane Explosion by 5 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Blink
glyphs.description: Increases the distance you travel with the Blink spell by 8 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Evocation
glyphs.description:
Your Evocation ability also causes you to regain 60% of your health over its duration.

With the Invocation talent, you instead gain 10% of your health upon completing an Evocation.

With the Rune of Power talent, you gain 1% of your health per second while standing in your own Rune of Power.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Combustion
glyphs.description: Increases the direct damage, the duration of the damage over time effect and the cooldown of Combustion by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Frost Nova
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of Frost Nova by 5 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Momentum
glyphs.description: Your Blink spell teleports you in the direction you are moving instead of the direction you are facing.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Ice Block
glyphs.description: When Ice Block terminates, it triggers an instant free Frost Nova and makes you immune to all spells for 3 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Splitting Ice
glyphs.description: Your Ice Lance and Icicles now hit 1 additional target for 50% damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Cone of Cold
glyphs.description: Increases the damage done by Cone of Cold by 200%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Rapid Displacement
glyphs.description: Blink now has 2 charges, gaining a charge every 15 sec, but no longer frees the caster from stuns and bonds.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mana Gem
glyphs.description: Your Conjure Mana Gem spell now creates a Brilliant Mana Gem, which holds up to 10 charges.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Crittermorph
glyphs.description: When cast on critters, your Polymorph spells now last 24 hrs and can be cast on multiple targets.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Polymorph
glyphs.description: Your Polymorph spell also removes all damage over time effects from the target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Icy Veins
glyphs.description: Your Icy Veins causes your Frostbolt, Frostfire Bolt, Ice Lance, and your Water Elemental's Waterbolt spells to split into 3 smaller bolts that each do 40% damage, instead of increasing spell casting speed.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Spellsteal
glyphs.description: Spellsteal now also heals you for 5% of your maximum health when it successfully steals a spell.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Aspects
glyphs.description: Each time you activate a new Aspect, an animal companion representing that Aspect will follow you for 15 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Camouflage
glyphs.description: Your Camouflage ability now provides stealth even while moving, but your movement speed while Camouflage is active is reduced by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Liberation
glyphs.description: When you Disengage, you are healed for 5% of your total health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mending
glyphs.description: Your Mend Pet now heals every 1 sec, and heals for an additional 25% of your pet's health over its duration.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Distracting Shot
glyphs.description: Your Distracting Shot now distracts the target to attack your pet instead of you.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Endless Wrath
glyphs.description: While Bestial Wrath is active, your pet cannot be killed, but can still be damaged.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Deterrence
glyphs.description: Increases the damage reduction granted by Deterrence by 20%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Disengage
glyphs.description: Increases the distance you travel when you Disengage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Freezing Trap
glyphs.description: When your Freezing Trap breaks, the victim's movement speed is reduced by 70% for 4 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Ice Trap
glyphs.description: Increases the radius of the effect from your Ice Trap by 2 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Misdirection
glyphs.description: When you use Misdirection on your pet, the cooldown on your Misdirection is reset.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Explosive Trap
glyphs.description: Your Explosive Trap no longer deals damage, instead knocking enemies back from the trap when it explodes.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Animal Bond
glyphs.description: While your pet is active, all healing done to you and your pet is increased by 10%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of No Escape
glyphs.description: Increases the ranged critical strike chance of all of your attacks on targets affected by your Freezing Trap by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Pathfinding
glyphs.description: Increases the speed bonus of your Aspect of the Cheetah and Aspect of the Pack by 8%, and increases your speed while mounted by 10%. The mounted movement speed increase does not stack with other effects.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Tame Beast
glyphs.description: Reduces the time required to complete Tame Beast by 4 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Snake Trap
glyphs.description: Snakes from your Snake Trap take 90% reduced damage from area of effect attacks.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Aimed Shot
glyphs.description: Your Aimed Shot can now be used while moving.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mend Pet
glyphs.description: Gives your Mend Pet ability a 100% chance of cleansing 1 Curse, Disease, Magic or Poison effect from your pet each tick.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Solace
glyphs.description: Your Freezing Trap and Scatter Shot also remove all damage over time effects from their targets.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shadow Walk
glyphs.description: Your Shadow Walk ability also increases your stealth detection while active.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Ambush
glyphs.description: Increases the range of Ambush by 5 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Decoy
glyphs.description: When you Vanish, you leave behind a brief illusion that very closely resembles you.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Blade Flurry
glyphs.description: Your attacks have a 30% higher chance of applying Non-Lethal poisons while Blade Flurry is active.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Sharpened Knives
glyphs.description: Your Fan of Knives also damages the armor of its victims, applying 1 application of the Weakened Armor effect to each target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Recuperate
glyphs.description: Increases the healing of your Recuperate ability by an additional 1.0% of your maximum health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Evasion
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of Evasion by 5 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Recovery
glyphs.description: While Recuperate is active, you receive 20% increased healing from other sources.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Expose Armor
glyphs.description: Your Expose Armor ability causes three applications of Weakened Armor.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Feint
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of Feint by 2 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Garrote
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of your Garrote ability's silence effect by 1.0 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Detection
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Detection.

Focus intently on trying to detect certain creatures.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Gouge
glyphs.description: Your Gouge ability no longer requires that the target be facing you.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hemorrhage
glyphs.description: Your Hemorrhage ability only causes lingering damage over time to targets that were already afflicted by a Bleed effect.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Smoke Bomb
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of your Smoke Bomb by 2 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Cheap Shot
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of your Cheap Shot by 0.5 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hemorrhaging Veins
glyphs.description: Your Sanguinary Veins ability now also increases damage done to targets affected by your Hemorrhage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Redirect
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of Redirect by 50 seconds.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shiv
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Shiv ability by 3 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Sprint
glyphs.description: Increases the movement speed of your Sprint ability by an additional 30%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Aquatic Form
glyphs.description: Increases your swim speed by 50% while in Aquatic Form.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Chameleon
glyphs.description: Each time you shapeshift into Cat Form or Bear Form, your shapeshifted form will have a random hair color.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Charm Woodland Creature
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Charm Woodland Creature.

Allows the Druid to befriend an ambient creature, which will follow the Druid for 1 hour.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Blooming
glyphs.description: Increases the bloom heal of your Lifebloom when it expires by 50%, but its duration is reduced by 5 sec and your Healing Touch, Nourish, and Regrowth abilities no longer refresh the duration.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Grace
glyphs.description: Feline Grace reduces falling damage even while not in Cat Form.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Revive Pet
glyphs.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Revive Pet by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Lesser Proportion
glyphs.description: Slightly reduces the size of your pet.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fireworks
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Fireworks.

Launch fireworks from your gun, bow or crossbow.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Stampede
glyphs.description: Your Stampede no longer summons pets from your stable, and instead uses copies of your current pet.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Aspect of the Pack
glyphs.description: Increases the range of your Aspect of the Pack ability by 15 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Porcupine
glyphs.description: Your Polymorph spell polymorphs the target into a porcupine instead.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Monkey
glyphs.description: Your Polymorph spell polymorphs the target into a monkey instead.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Conjure Familiar
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Conjure Familiar.

Conjures a familiar stone, containing either an Arcane, Fiery, or Icy Familiar.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Penguin
glyphs.description: Your Polymorph spell polymorphs the target into a penguin instead.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Arcane Language
glyphs.description: Your Arcane Brilliance spell allows you to comprehend your allies' racial languages.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Contemplation
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Contemplation.

Allows you a moment of peace as you kneel in quiet contemplation to ponder the nature of the Light.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Mounted King
glyphs.description: Mounting one of your Paladin class mounts automatically casts Blessing of Kings on you.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Winged Vengeance
glyphs.description: Your Avenging Wrath depicts 4 wings.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Flash of Light
glyphs.description: When you Flash of Light a target, it increases your next heal done to that target within 7 sec by 10%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Seal of Blood
glyphs.description: Your Seal of Truth now uses the Seal of Blood visual.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fire From the Heavens
glyphs.description: Your Judgment and Hammer of Wrath criticals call down fire from the sky.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shadow Ravens
glyphs.description: Your Shadow Orbs now appear as Shadow Ravens.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Levitate
glyphs.description: Increases your movement speed while Levitating and for 10 sec afterward by 15%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Borrowed Time
glyphs.description: Your Borrowed Time is now displayed visually.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shackle Undead
glyphs.description: Changes the appearance of your Shackle Undead.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Reflective Shield
glyphs.description: Causes 70% of the damage you absorb with Power Word: Shield to reflect back at the attacker.  This damage causes no threat.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Dark Archangel
glyphs.description: When you apply Devouring Plague to a target, you take on the form of a Dark Archangel for 8 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Distract
glyphs.description: Increases the range of your Distract ability by 5 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Pick Lock
glyphs.description: Reduces the cast time of your Pick Lock ability by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Pick Pocket
glyphs.description: Increases the range of your Pick Pocket ability by 5 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Safe Fall
glyphs.description: Increases the distance your Safe Fall ability allows you to fall without taking damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Blurred Speed
glyphs.description: Enables you to walk on water while your Sprint ability is active.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Poisons
glyphs.description: You apply poisons to your weapons 50% faster.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Astral Recall
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Astral Recall spell by 5 minutes.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Spectral Wolf
glyphs.description: Alters the appearance of your Ghost Wolf transformation, causing it to resemble a large, spectral wolf.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Far Sight
glyphs.description: Your Far Sight spell may be used indoors.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Healing Storm
glyphs.description: Each application of Maelstrom Weapon also increases your direct healing done by 20%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Totemic Encirclement
glyphs.description: When you cast a totem spell, you also place unempowered totems for any elements that are not currently active.  These totems have 5 health and produce no other effects.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Unending Breath
glyphs.description: Increases the swim speed of targets affected by your Unending Breath spell by 20%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Soul Consumption
glyphs.description: [ Affliction: Your Drain Soul restores 20% of your total health after you kill a target that yields experience or honor] [ Destruction: You restore 20% of your total health after you kill a target with Chaos Bolt that yields experience or honor]

glyphs.name: Glyph of Eye of Kilrogg
glyphs.description:
Your Eye of Kilrogg is no longer stealthed and can now place your Demonic Circle. The casting Warlock must be within line of sight of the Eye of Kilrogg to place the Demonic Circle.

In addition, the movement speed of your Eye of Kilrogg is increased by 50% and allows it to fly in areas where flying mounts are enabled.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Curse of Exhaustion
glyphs.description: Curse of Exhaustion now reduces the targets movement speed by [Glyph of Curse of Exhaustion: 30 / 70]%, lasts half as long and has a 10 second cooldown.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Subjugate Demon
glyphs.description: Reduces the cast time of your Subjugate Demon spell by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Soulwell
glyphs.description: Your soulwell glows with an eerie light.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mystic Shout
glyphs.description: Your Battle Shout and Commanding Shout cause you to hover in the air for 1 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Bloodcurdling Shout
glyphs.description: Your Battle Shout and Commanding Shout terrify small animals.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Long Charge
glyphs.description: Increases the range of your Charge ability by 5 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Gushing Wound
glyphs.description: Your Deep Wounds are even bloodier than normal.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Unending Rage
glyphs.description: Increases your maximum Rage by 20.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mighty Victory
glyphs.description: When your Victory Rush or Impending Victory heal you, you grow slightly larger.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mortal Strike
glyphs.description: When your Mortal Strike is affecting a target, healing effects on you are increased by 10%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Bloody Healing
glyphs.description: Increases the healing you receive from bandages by 20% while your Deep Wounds is active.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Enraged Speed
glyphs.description: While Enraged, you move 20% faster.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hindering Strikes
glyphs.description: Your Heroic Strike and Cleave now also reduce the target's movement speed by 50% for 8 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Heavy Repercussions
glyphs.description: While your Shield Block is active, your Shield Slam hits for an additional 50% damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Bloodthirst
glyphs.description: Increases the healing of Bloodthirst by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Rude Interruption
glyphs.description: Successfully interrupting a spell with Pummel increases your damage by 6% for 20 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Gag Order
glyphs.description: Your Pummel and Heroic Throw also silence the target for 3 sec.  Does not work against players.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Blitz
glyphs.description: Your Charge also [Warbringer: roots and snares / stuns ]an additional 2 nearby targets.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Die by the Sword
glyphs.description: While Die by the Sword is active, using Overpower increases its duration by 1 sec and using Wild Strike increases its duration by 0.5 sec per use.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hamstring
glyphs.description: When you spend Rage to apply Hamstring, the Rage cost of your next Hamstring is reduced by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hold the Line
glyphs.description: Improves the damage of your next Revenge by 50% following a successful parry.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shield Slam
glyphs.description: Your Shield Slam now dispels 1 magical effect.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hoarse Voice
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown and Rage generation of your Battle and Commanding Shout by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Sweeping Strikes
glyphs.description: When you hit a target with Sweeping Strikes, you gain 1 Rage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Resonating Power
glyphs.description: Increases the damage and cooldown of Thunder Clap by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Victory Rush
glyphs.description:
Increases the total healing provided by your Victory Rush by 50%.
This glyph has no effect if combined with the Impending Victory talent.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Raging Wind
glyphs.description: Your Raging Blow hits increase the damage of your next Whirlwind by 10%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Anti-Magic Shell
glyphs.description: Causes your Anti-Magic Shell to absorb all incoming magical damage, up to the absorption limit.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Unholy Frenzy
glyphs.description: Causes your Unholy Frenzy to no longer deal damage to the affected target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Geist
glyphs.description: Your Raise Dead spell summons a geist instead of a ghoul.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Icebound Fortitude
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Icebound Fortitude by 50%, but also reduces its duration by 75%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Chains of Ice
glyphs.description: Your Chains of Ice also causes 144<!--term-->to_lc<!--term-->156 Frost damage, with additional damage depending on your attack power.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Death's Embrace
glyphs.description: Your Death Coil refunds 20 Runic Power when used to heal an allied minion, but will no longer trigger Blood Tap when used this way.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Death Grip
glyphs.description: Increases the range of your Death Grip ability by 5 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Death and Decay
glyphs.description: Your Death and Decay also reduces the movement speed of enemies within its radius by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shifting Presences
glyphs.description: You retain 70% of your Runic Power when switching Presences.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Horn of Winter
glyphs.description: When used outside of combat, your Horn of Winter ability causes a brief, localized snow flurry.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Icy Touch
glyphs.description: Your Icy Touch dispels one helpful Magic effect from the target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Enduring Infection
glyphs.description: Your diseases are undispellable, but their damage dealt is reduced by 15%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Pestilence
glyphs.description: Increases the radius of your Pestilence effect by 5 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mind Freeze
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Freeze ability by 1 sec, but also raises its cost by 10 Runic Power.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Army of the Dead
glyphs.description: The ghouls summoned by your Army of the Dead no longer taunt their target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Foul Menagerie
glyphs.description: Causes your Army of the Dead spell to summon an assortment of undead minions.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Strangulate
glyphs.description: Increases the Silence duration of your Strangulate ability by 2 sec when used on a target who is casting a spell.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Pillar of Frost
glyphs.description: Empowers your Pillar of Frost, making you immune to all effects that cause loss of control of your character, but also reduces your movement speed by 70% while the ability is active.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Vampiric Blood
glyphs.description: Increases the bonus healing received while your Vampiric Blood is active by an additional 15%, but your Vampiric Blood no longer grants you health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Dash
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Dash ability by 60 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Ghost Wolf
glyphs.description: While in Ghost Wolf form, you are less hindered by effects that would reduce movement speed.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Resilient Grip
glyphs.description: When your Death Grip ability fails because its target is immune, its cooldown is reset.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Path of Frost
glyphs.description: Your Path of Frost ability allows you to fall from a greater distance without suffering damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Death Gate
glyphs.description: Reduces the cast time of your Death Gate spell by 60%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Unholy Command
glyphs.description: Immediately finishes the cooldown of your Death Grip upon dealing a killing blow to a target that grants experience or honor.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Outbreak
glyphs.description: Your Outbreak spell no longer has a cooldown, but now costs 30 Runic Power.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Corpse Explosion
glyphs.description: Teaches you the ability Corpse Explosion.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Denounce
glyphs.description: Your Holy Shocks reduce the cast time of your next Denounce by 0.5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Dazing Shield
glyphs.description: Your Avenger's Shield now also dazes targets for 10 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Immediate Truth
glyphs.description: Increases the instant damage done by Seal of Truth by 40%, but decreases the damage done by Censure by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Frostfire Bolt
glyphs.description: Reduces the cast time of Frostfire Bolt by 0.5 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Remove Curse
glyphs.description: Increases the damage you deal by 5% for 10 sec after you successfully remove a curse.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Thunderstorm
glyphs.description: Removes the knockback effect from your Thunderstorm spell.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Stars
glyphs.description: Your Moonkin Form now appears as Astral Form, conferring all the same benefits, but appearing as an astrally enhanced version of your normal humanoid form.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Master Shapeshifter
glyphs.description: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifts by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Arcane Power
glyphs.description: Increases the duration and cooldown of Arcane Power by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Survival Instincts
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of Survival Instincts by 60 sec, but reduces its duration by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Wild Growth
glyphs.description: Wild Growth can affect 1 additional target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Might of Ursoc
glyphs.description: Increases the health gain from Might of Ursoc by 20%, but increases the cooldown by 2 min.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Stampeding Roar
glyphs.description: Increases the radius of Stampeding Roar by 30 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Cyclone
glyphs.description: Increases the range of your Cyclone spell by 5 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Barkskin
glyphs.description: Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by 25% while Barkskin is active.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Chimera Shot
glyphs.description: Increases the healing you receive from Chimera Shot by an additional 2% of your maximum health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Tranquilizing Shot
glyphs.description: Your Tranquilizing Shot no longer costs Focus, but has a 10 sec cooldown.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Aspect of the Cheetah
glyphs.description: Your Aspect of the Cheetah no longer causes you to be dazed when struck.  Instead, the effect is cancelled and all your Aspects are placed on a 4 sec cooldown.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Master's Call
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of your Master's Call by 4 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Scatter Shot
glyphs.description: Increases the range of Scatter Shot by 3 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mirrored Blades
glyphs.description: When attacked by a spell while in Deterrence, you have a 100% chance to reflect it back at the attacker.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Water Elemental
glyphs.description: Increases the health of your Water Elemental by 40%, and allows it to cast while moving. When in Assist mode and in combat, commanding your Water Elemental to Follow will cause it to stay near you and autocast Waterbolt when your target is in range.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Slow
glyphs.description: Your Arcane Blast spell applies the Slow spell to any target it damages if no target is currently affected by your Slow.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Illusion
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Illusion.

Transforms the Mage to look like someone else for 2 min.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mirror Image
glyphs.description: Your Mirror Images cast Arcane Blast or Fireball instead of Frostbolt depending on your primary talent tree.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Deep Freeze
glyphs.description: Your Deep Freeze spell is no longer on the global cooldown, but its duration is reduced by 1 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Beacon of Light
glyphs.description: Removes the global cooldown on Beacon of Light.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hammer of the Righteous
glyphs.description: The physical damage reduction caused by Hammer of the Righteous now lasts 50% longer.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Divine Storm
glyphs.description: Your Divine Storm also heals you for 5% of your maximum health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Alabaster Shield
glyphs.description: Your successful blocks increase the damage of your next Shield of the Righteous by 10%. Stacks up to 3 times.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Divine Plea
glyphs.description: Divine Plea returns 50% less mana but has a 50% shorter cooldown.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Holy Shock
glyphs.description: Decreases the healing of Holy Shock by 50% but increases its damage by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Inquisition
glyphs.description: When you land a killing blow on an opponent that yields experience or honor, the duration of your Inquisition is increased by 30 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Dispersion
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown on Dispersion by 15 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Leap of Faith
glyphs.description: Your Leap of Faith spell now also clears all movement impairing effects from your target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Penance
glyphs.description: Increases the mana cost of Penance by 20% but allows Penance to be cast while moving.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Focused Mending
glyphs.description: Causes your Prayer of Mending to only bounce between the target and the caster.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mind Spike
glyphs.description: Your successful non-instant Mind Spikes, reduce the cast time of your next Mind Blast within 9 sec by 50%. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Binding Heal
glyphs.description: Your Binding Heal spell now heals a third friendly target within 20 yards, but costs 35% more mana.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Vendetta
glyphs.description: Reduces the damage bonus of your Vendetta ability by 5% but increases its duration by 10 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Killing Spree
glyphs.description: Your Killing Spree returns you to your starting location when the effect ends.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Stealth
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by 4 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Deadly Momentum
glyphs.description: When you land a killing blow on an opponent that yields experience or honor, your Slice and Dice and Recuperate abilities are refreshed to their original duration.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Tricks of the Trade
glyphs.description: Your Tricks of the Trade ability no longer costs Energy, but also no longer increases the damage dealt by the target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Disguise
glyphs.description: When you Pick Pocket a humanoid enemy, you also copy their appearance for 5 min.  Your disguise will unravel upon entering combat.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Cloak of Shadows
glyphs.description: While Cloak of Shadows is active, you take 40% less physical damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Thunder
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown on Thunderstorm by 10 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Feral Spirit
glyphs.description: Increases the healing done by your Feral Spirits' Spirit Hunt by 40%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Riptide
glyphs.description: Removes the cooldown of Riptide, but reduces the initial direct healing by 75%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Deluge
glyphs.description: Your Chain Heal now has a watery appearance.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shamanistic Rage
glyphs.description: Activating your Shamanistic Rage ability also cleanses you of all dispellable harmful Magic effects.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hex
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Hex spell by 10 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Totemic Vigor
glyphs.description: Increases the health of your totems by 5% of your maximum health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Drain Life
glyphs.description: Increases the healing of your Drain Life by 30%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Demon Hunting
glyphs.description:
Requires Demonology.

Teaches you the ability Dark Apotheosis.

Dark Apotheosis
You imbue yourself with demonic energies, reducing physical damage taken by 13.85%, reduces magic damage taken by 15%, and allows the use of various demonic abilities.

In addition, Soulshatter becomes Provocation which taunts your target, Twilight Ward becomes Fury Ward which will absorb all schools of damage, Shadow Bolt becomes Demonic Slash, and Fear becomes Sleep.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Ember Tap
glyphs.description: Ember Tap heals you for an additional 5% of your health, but the health is restored over 10 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Demonic Circle
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown on Demonic Circle by 4 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Unending Resolve
glyphs.description: The damage reduction of Unending Resolve is reduced by 20%, but the cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Life Tap
glyphs.description:
Your Life Tap no longer consumes health, but instead absorbs [(totalHealth * 0.15)] healing received. This effect stacks.

The absorb lasts 30 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Crimson Banish
glyphs.description: Your Banish spell is now red.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Whirlwind
glyphs.description: Increases the radius of Whirlwind by 4 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Death From Above
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown on Heroic Leap by 15 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Victorious Throw
glyphs.description: Increases the range of Victory Rush and Impending Victory by 15 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Intimidating Shout
glyphs.description: All targets of your Intimidating Shout now tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Spell Reflection
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown on Spell Reflection by 5 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shield Wall
glyphs.description: Shield Wall now reduces damage taken by an additional 20%, but its cooldown is increased by 2 min.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Dancing Rune Weapon
glyphs.description: Increases your threat generation by 100% while your Dancing Rune Weapon is active, but reduces its damage dealt by 25%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Dark Simulacrum
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of Dark Simulacrum by 30 sec and increases its duration by 4 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Death Coil
glyphs.description: Your Death Coil spell is now usable on all allies.  When cast on a non-undead ally, Death Coil shrouds them with a protective barrier that absorbs up to [(<!--pts1:1:0:47541-->1133<!----> + 0.514 * <!--term-->attackPower<!--term-->) * <!--sp55090:0-->1<!--sp55090-->] damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Tranquil Grip
glyphs.description: Your Death Grip spell no longer taunts the target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Ferocious Bite
glyphs.description: Your Ferocious Bite ability heals you for 2% of your maximum health for each 10 Energy used.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Thunder Strike
glyphs.description: Your Thunder Clap visual includes a lightning strike.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Counterspell
glyphs.description: Your Counterspell can now be cast while casting or channeling other spells, but its cooldown is increased by 4 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Eternal Resolve
glyphs.description:
Outside of Battlegrounds and Arenas:
[ Affliction: Increases the duration of Unstable Affliction, Corruption and Agony] [ Demonology: Increases the duration of Corruption and Doom] [ Destruction: Increases the duration of Corruption, Doom, and Agony] by 50%, and reduces their damage by 20%.

Inside of Battlegrounds and Arenas:
Unending Resolve can no longer be activated, but passively provides 10% damage reduction from all sources.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Rapid Teleportation
glyphs.description: After casting a Mage Teleport spell, or entering a Mage Portal, your movement speed is increased by 70% for 1 min.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Vanish
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of your Vanish effect by 2 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Kick
glyphs.description: Increases the cooldown of your Kick ability by 4 sec, but this cooldown is reduced by 6 sec when your Kick successfully interrupts a spell.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Colossus Smash
glyphs.description: Your Colossus Smash also applies the Sunder Armor effect to your target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Inferno Blast
glyphs.description: Your Inferno Blast spell spreads Pyroblast, Ignite, and Combustion to 1 additional target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Blind
glyphs.description: Your Blind ability also removes all damage over time effects from the target that would cause Blind to break early.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Protector of the Innocent
glyphs.description: When you use Word of Glory to heal another target, it also heals you for 20% of the amount.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Bull Rush
glyphs.description: Your Charge generates 15 additional Rage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Recklessness
glyphs.description: Decreases the critical chance of Recklessness by 12% but increases its duration by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fae Silence
glyphs.description: Faerie Fire used in Bear Form also silences the target for 3 sec, but triggers a 15 sec cooldown.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Faerie Fire
glyphs.description: Increases the range of your Faerie Fire by 10 yds.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Predator
glyphs.description: Your Track Humanoids ability now also tracks beasts.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Cat Form
glyphs.description: Increases healing done to you by 20% while in Cat Form.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Treant
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Treant Form.

Shapeshift into Treant Form.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Dark Succor
glyphs.description: When you kill an enemy that yields experience or honor, while in Frost or Unholy Presence, your next Death Strike within 15 sec is free and will restore at least 20% of your maximum health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Armors
glyphs.description: Reduces the cast time of your Frost Armor, Mage Armor, and Molten Armor spells by 1.5 sec, and increases the defensive effect of each Armor by an additional 10%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Lightning Shield
glyphs.description: When your Lightning Shield is triggered, you take 10% less damage for 6 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shadow
glyphs.description: Alters the appearance of your Shadowform to be less transparent.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Focused Wrath
glyphs.description: Holy Wrath only affects one target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Falling Avenger
glyphs.description: You slow fall during Avenging Wrath.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Righteous Retreat
glyphs.description: During Divine Shield, you can invoke your Hearthstone 50% faster.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Bladed Judgment
glyphs.description: Your Judgment spell depicts an axe or sword instead of a hammer, if you have an axe or sword equipped.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Crow Feast
glyphs.description: Your Execute critical strikes summon a flock of carrion birds.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Burning Anger
glyphs.description: You get so angry when Enraged that you catch on fire.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Battle Healer
glyphs.description: Melee attacks from Seal of Insight heal the most wounded member of your raid or party for 30% of the normal heal instead of you.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Rapid Rolling
glyphs.description: For 5 sec seconds after using Roll or Chi Torpedo, your next Roll or Chi Torpedo will go 30% farther.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Guard
glyphs.description: Increases the amount your Guard absorbs by 10%, but your Guard can only absorb magical damage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Zen Meditation
glyphs.description: You can now channel Zen Meditation while moving.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Surging Mist
glyphs.description: Your Surging Mist no longer requires a target, and instead heals the lowest health target within 40 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Enduring Healing Sphere
glyphs.description: Increases the duration of your Healing Spheres by 3 minutes.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mind Flay
glyphs.description: Your Mind Flay spell no longer slows your victim's movement speed.  Instead, each time Mind Flay deals damage you will be granted 15% increased movement speed for 5 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shadow Word: Death
glyphs.description:
Your Shadow Word: Death can now be cast at any time, but deals 25% damage against targets above 20% health [Mind Flay: and does not generate a Shadow Orb when used against them].

Casting Shadow Word: Death now also does damage to you equivalent to the damage it would do to an enemy above 20% health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Vampiric Embrace
glyphs.description: Your Vampiric Embrace converts an additional 50% of the damage you deal into healing, but the duration is reduced by 5 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Heavens
glyphs.description: Your Levitate targets will appear to be riding on a cloud for the duration of the spell.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Incite
glyphs.description: Using Demoralizing Shout makes your next 3 Heroic Strike or Cleave abilities free.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mass Exorcism
glyphs.description: Reduces the range of Exorcism to melee range, but causes 25% damage to all enemies within 8 yards of the primary target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Transcendence
glyphs.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Transcendence: Transfer spell by 5 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Spinning Crane Kick
glyphs.description: You move at full speed while channeling Spinning Crane Kick.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Renewing Mist
glyphs.description: Your Renewing Mist travels to the furthest injured target within 40 yards rather than the closest injured target within 20 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Touch of Death
glyphs.description: Your Touch of Death no longer has a Chi cost, but the cooldown is increased by 2 minutes.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Breath of Fire
glyphs.description: When you use Breath of Fire on targets afflicted with your Dizzying Haze, they become Disoriented for 3 sec.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Clash
glyphs.description: Increases the range of your Clash ability by 10 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Flying Serpent Kick
glyphs.description: Your Flying Serpent Kick automatically ends when you fly into an enemy, triggering the area of effect damage and snare.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Spinning Fire Blossom
glyphs.description: Your Spinning Fire Blossom requires an enemy target rather than traveling in front of you, but is no longer capable of rooting targets.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Mana Tea
glyphs.description: Your Mana Tea is instant instead of channeled and consumes two stacks when used, but causes a 10 sec cooldown.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Blazing Trail
glyphs.description: Your Charge leaves a trail of fire in its wake. If you're going to Charge why not do it with some style?

glyphs.name: Glyph of Leer of the Ox
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the spell Leer of the Ox.

Leer of the Ox
Your Ox Statue stirs hatred in the target, reducing their movement speed by 50% and causing them to attack your Black Ox Statue for 8 sec. The statue must be within 40 yards of the target.

Requires Black Ox Statue to be active.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Aspect of the Beast
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Aspect of the Beast.

The Hunter takes on the aspects of a beast, becoming untrackable. Only one Aspect can be active at a time.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Black Ice
glyphs.description: While you move through the area affected by your Ice Trap you gain 50% movement speed.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fortuitous Spheres
glyphs.description: Falling below 25% health will automatically summon a healing sphere near you at no cost.  This effect cannot occur more often than once every 30 seconds.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Life Cocoon
glyphs.description: Life Cocoon can now be cast while stunned.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Rising Tiger Kick
glyphs.description: Your Rising Sun Kick's visual is altered to the color of the White Tiger.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Spirit Roll
glyphs.description: You can cast Roll or Chi Torpedo while dead as a spirit.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fortifying Brew
glyphs.description: Your Fortifying Brew reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, but increases your health by 10% rather than 20%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Detox
glyphs.description: Detox heals your target for 5% when it successfully removes a harmful effect.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Nimble Brew
glyphs.description: Clearing an effect with Nimble Brew heals you for 10% of your maximum health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Jab
glyphs.description: You always will attack with hands and fist with Jab, even with non-fist weapons equipped.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Targeted Expulsion
glyphs.description:
[ Mistweaver: Outside of Battlegrounds and Arenas:
Your Uplift no longer costs Chi, but instead costs 10% Mana.

Inside of Battlegrounds and Arenas:]Expel Harm can now be used on other allies, but the healing is reduced by 50% on them.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fists of Fury
glyphs.description: When channeling Fists of Fury, your parry chance is increased by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Sparring
glyphs.description: While Sparring, you also have a 5% chance to deflect spells from attackers in front of you, stacking up to 3 times.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Afterlife
glyphs.description: Increases the chance to summon a Healing Sphere when you kill an enemy while gaining experience or honor to 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Touch of Karma
glyphs.description: Your Touch of Karma now has a 25 yard range.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Honor
glyphs.description: You honorably bow after each successful Touch of Death.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Paralysis
glyphs.description: Your Paralysis ability also removes all damage over time effects from the target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fighting Pose
glyphs.description: Your spirit now appears in a fighting pose when using Transcendence.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Zen Flight
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the spell Zen Flight. Zen Flight requires a Flight Master's License in order to be cast.

Zen Flight
You fly through the air at a quick speed on a meditative cloud.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Water Roll
glyphs.description: You can Roll or Chi Torpedo over water.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Crackling Tiger Lightning
glyphs.description: Your Crackling Jade Lightning visual is altered to the color of the White Tiger celestial.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Lightwell
glyphs.description: Your Lightwell no longer automatically heals nearby targets, but can be clicked by players to deal 50% more healing than normal.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Confession
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Confession.

Compels a friendly target to confess a secret.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Holy Resurrection
glyphs.description: Your resurrection target appears bathed in holy light for the duration of the Resurrection cast.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Val'kyr
glyphs.description: While Spirit of Redemption is active, you now appear as a Val'kyr.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Direction
glyphs.description: Causes your Misdirection target to appear larger.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Marking
glyphs.description: Your Hunter's Mark ability now places a bullseye on your target instead of its usual visual.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shadowy Friends
glyphs.description: Your Shadowform extends to your non-combat pets.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fetch
glyphs.description:
Teaches you the ability Fetch.

Command your pet to retrieve the loot from a nearby corpse within 40 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Cheetah
glyphs.description: Your Travel Form appears as a Cheetah.  This glyph will prevent Glyph of the Stag from functioning.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Blackout Kick
glyphs.description: Your Blackout Kick always deals 20% additional damage over 4 sec regardless of positioning but you're unable to trigger the healing effect.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Discreet Magic
glyphs.description: Your Nether Tempest, Living Bomb, Frost Bomb, Arcane Barrage, and Inferno Blast no longer affect targets more than 5 yds away from their primary target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Supernova
glyphs.description: When you are killed, all enemies within 8 yards take damage equal to 10% of your maximum health per Burning Ember held.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Gateway Attunement
glyphs.description: Demonic Gateways will automatically activate when you step near them.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Focus
glyphs.description: Reduces Starfall's radius by 50%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Angels
glyphs.description: Your heal spells momentarily grant you angelic wings.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Rain of Frogs
glyphs.description: You summon a rain storm of frogs at your targeted location.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Efflorescence
glyphs.description: The Efflorescence effect is now caused by your Wild Mushroom instead of by Swiftmend, and lasts as long as the Wild Mushroom is active.  Additionally, increases  the healing done by Swiftmend by 20%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Swift Death
glyphs.description: The haste effect granted by Soul Reaper now also increases your movement speed by 30% for the duration.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Loud Horn
glyphs.description: Your Horn of Winter now generates an additional 10 Runic Power, but the cooldown is increased by 100%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Regenerative Magic
glyphs.description: If Anti-Magic Shell expires after its full duration, the cooldown is reduced by up to 50%, based on the amount of damage absorbtion remaining.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Festering Blood
glyphs.description: Blood Boil will now treat all targets as though they have Blood Plague or Frost Fever applied.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Divine Shield
glyphs.description: Removing harmful effects with Divine Shield heals you for 10% for each effect removed.  This heal cannot exceed 50% of your maximum health.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Hand of Sacrifice
glyphs.description: Hand of Sacrifice no longer redirects damage to the Paladin.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Purging
glyphs.description: Successfully Purging a target now grants a stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Eternal Earth
glyphs.description: Your Lightning Bolt has a chance to add a charge to your currently active Earth Shield.  This cannot cause Earth Shield to exceed 9 charges.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Havoc
glyphs.description: Havoc gains 3 additional charges, but the cooldown is increased by 35 seconds.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Impaling Throws
glyphs.description: Heroic Throw now leaves an axe in the target, which can be retrieved by moving within 5 yards of the target to finish the cooldown of Heroic Throw.  This effect will only occur when Heroic Throw is cast from more than 10 yards away from the target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Executor
glyphs.description: Killing an enemy with Execute grants you 30 rage.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Skeleton
glyphs.description: Your Raise Dead spell summons a skeleton instead of a ghoul.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Long Winter
glyphs.description: The effect of your Horn of Winter now lasts for 1 hour.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Sprouting Mushroom
glyphs.description: Your Wild Mushroom spell can now be placed on the ground instead of underneath a target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of One With Nature
glyphs.description: Grants you the ability to teleport to a random natural location.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Unbound Elemental
glyphs.description: Your Water Elemental is replaced by an Unbound Water Elemental.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Evaporation
glyphs.description: Reduces the size of your Water Elemental by 40%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Condensation
glyphs.description: Increases the size of your Water Elemental by 40%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Exorcist
glyphs.description: Exorcism will now appear to remove the evil from its target.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Pillar of Light
glyphs.description: Critical heals on other players display a small pillar of light at their location briefly.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Sha
glyphs.description: Transforms your Shadowfiend and Mindbender into a Sha Beast.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Shifted Appearances
glyphs.description:
Void Shift causes you and your target to exchange appearances for several seconds.

Does not affect mounted players.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Inspired Hymns
glyphs.description: While channeling Hymns, a spirit appears above you.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Headhunter
glyphs.description: Your Throw and Deadly Throw abilities will now throw axes regardless of your currently equipped weapon.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Improved Distraction
glyphs.description: Distract now summons a decoy at the target location.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Spirit Raptors
glyphs.description: Your Spirit Wolves are replaced with Spirit Raptors.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Lingering Ancestors
glyphs.description: Resurrecting someone with Ancestral Spirit causes a ghostly ancestor to follow them around for a short time.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Spirit Wolf
glyphs.description: Ghost Wolf can be now be used while you are a ghost.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Flaming Serpents
glyphs.description: Your Searing Totem now resembles Vol'jin's Serpent Ward.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Compy
glyphs.description: Your Hex now transforms enemies into a Compy.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Elemental Familiars
glyphs.description: Summons a random Fire, Water, or Nature familiar.  Familiars of different types have a tendency to fight each other.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Astral Fixation
glyphs.description: Astral Recall now takes you to your capital's Earthshrine.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Raging Whirlwind
glyphs.description: Whirlwind gives you 15 rage over 6 sec, but for that time you no longer generate rage from autoattacks.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Subtle Defender
glyphs.description: Removes the threat generation bonus from Defensive Stance.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Watchful Eye
glyphs.description: Intervene will now target the party or raid member with the lowest health within 25 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Weaponmaster
glyphs.description: Your Shout abilities cause the appearance of your weapon to change to that of a random weapon from your primary bag for 10 min.

glyphs.name: Glyph of the Lean Pack
glyphs.description: Reduces the radius of Aspect of the Pack by 33 yards.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Focused Fire (NYI)
glyphs.description: Focus Fire charges apply a visual to you for each charge active.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Enduring Deceit
glyphs.description: Camouflage also reduces spell damage taken by 10%.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Chameleon (NYI)
glyphs.description: Focus Fire charges apply a visual to you for each charge active.

62.description: Manipulate the arcane, destroying enemies with overwhelming power.

63.description: Ignite enemies with balls of fire and combustive flames.

64.description: Freezes enemies in their tracks and shatters them with Frost magic.

65.description: Invokes the power of the Light to protect and to heal.

66.description: Uses Holy magic to shield <himself/herself> and defend allies from attackers.

70.description: A righteous crusader who judges and punishes opponents with weapons and Holy magic.

71.description: A battle-hardened master of two-handed weapons, using mobility and overpowering attacks to strike <his/her> opponents down.

72.description: A furious berserker wielding a weapon in each hand, unleashing a flurry of attacks to carve <his/her> opponents to pieces.

73.description: A stalwart protector who uses a shield to safeguard <himself/herself> and <his/her> allies.

102.description: Can take on the form of a powerful Moonkin, balancing the power of Arcane and Nature magic to destroy enemies at a distance.

103.description: Takes on the form of a great cat to deal damage with bleeds and bites.

104.description: Takes on the form of a mighty bear to absorb damage and protect allies.

105.description: Uses heal-over-time Nature spells to keep allies alive.

250.description: A dark guardian who manipulates and corrupts life energy to sustain <himself/herself> in the face of an enemy onslaught.

251.description: An icy harbinger of doom, channeling runic power and delivering vicious weapon strikes.

252.description: A master of death and decay, spreading infection and controlling undead minions to do <his/her> bidding.

253.description: A master of the wild who can tame a wide variety of beasts to assist <him/her> in combat.

254.description: A master archer or sharpshooter who excels in bringing down enemies from afar.

255.description: A rugged tracker who favors using animal venom, explosives and traps as deadly weapons.

256.description: Uses magic to shield allies from taking damage as well as heal their wounds.

257.description: A versatile healer who can reverse damage on individuals or groups and even heal from beyond the grave.

258.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.

259.description: A deadly master of poisons who dispatches victims with vicious dagger strikes.

260.description: A swashbuckler who uses agility and guile to stand toe-to-toe with enemies.

261.description: A dark stalker who leaps from the shadows to ambush <his/her> unsuspecting prey.

262.description: A spellcaster who harnesses the destructive forces of nature and the elements.

263.description: A totemic warrior who strikes foes with weapons imbued with elemental power.

264.description: A healer who calls upon ancestral spirits and the cleansing power of water to mend allies' wounds.

265.description: A master of shadow magic who specializes in drains and damage-over-time spells.

266.description: A master of demonic magic who transforms into a demon and compels demonic powers to aid him.

267.description: A master of chaos who calls down fire to burn and demolish enemies.

268.description: A sturdy brawler who uses liquid fortification and unpredictable movement to avoid damage and protect allies.

269.description: A martial artist without peer who pummels foes with hands and fists.

270.description: A healer who mixes traditional herbal medicine with Pandaren martial arts.

103826.description_enus: You can Charge every 12 sec instead of every 20 sec.

103827.description_enus:
You can use Charge twice in a row. Each use has a 20 sec recharge time.

Charge can only grant Rage once every 12 sec.

103828.description_enus: Your Charge also pins a target to the ground, rooting it for 4 sec and reducing movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

55694.description_enus:
Instantly heals you for 10% of your total health, and an additional 10% over 5 sec.

Can be used while stunned.

Effects are doubled if used while Enraged.

29838.description_enus: Whenever you are below 35% health, you regenerate 3% health per second.

103840.description_enus:
Instantly attack the target causing [Seasoned Soldier: (1.25 * 1246) / 1246] damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory.

Replaces Victory Rush.

107566.description_enus: Causes all enemies within 20 yards that are snared to become rooted for 5 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

12323.description_enus: Snares all enemies within 15 yards, reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

102060.description_enus:
Interrupts all spellcasting within 10 yards and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.

This ability shares a 15 sec cooldown with Pummel.

46924.description_enus:
You become a whirling storm of destructive force, striking all targets within 8 yards [Bloodthirst: with both weapons] for [Seasoned Soldier: 180 / 120]% weapon damage every 1 sec for 6 sec.

During a Bladestorm, you can continue to dodge, block, and parry, and are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects. However, you can only perform shout abilities.

46968.description_enus:
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone before you, causing [Seasoned Soldier: (75 / 100 * attackPower * 1.2) / (75 / 100 * attackPower)] damage and stunning all enemy targets within 10 yards for 4 sec.

Causing damage to 3 or more targets lowers the cooldown of the next Shockwave by 20 sec.

118000.description_enus: Roar ferociously, causing [Seasoned Soldier: 151.2 / 126] damage to all enemies within 8 yards, knocking them back and knocking them down for 0.50 sec. Dragon Roar is always a critical strike and ignores all armor on the target.

114028.description_enus: Reflects the next spell cast on you and on all party and raid members within 20 yards for 5 sec.

114029.description_enus:
Run at high speed towards a party or raid member, removing all movement-impairing effects upon you, intercepting the next melee or ranged attack made against them and reducing their damage taken by 20% for 6 sec.

Replaces Intervene.

114030.description_enus:
Focus your protective gaze on a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30% for 12 sec.

During the duration of Vigilance, your Taunt has no cooldown.

107574.description_enus: You transform into a colossus for 24 sec, breaking all roots and snares and increasing your damage dealt by 20%.

12292.description_enus: For the next 12 sec, causes your melee special attacks to deal an additional 30% damage as a bleed over 6 sec. While bleeding, the target moves at 50% reduced speed.

107570.description_enus: Hurl your weapon at an enemy, causing 125% weapon damage and stunning the target for 4 sec.  Deals 500% weapon damage to targets that are permanently immune to stuns.

85499.description_enus: Increases your movement speed by 70% for 8 sec.

87172.description_enus: A successful Judgment increases your movement speed by 45% for 3 sec.

26023.description_enus: You gain 15% movement speed at all times, plus an additional 5% movement speed for each current charge of Holy Power up to 3.

105593.description_enus:
Stuns the target for 6 sec.

Replaces Hammer of Justice.

20066.description_enus: Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them for up to 1 min.  Any damage from sources other than Censure will awaken the target.  Usable against Demons, Dragonkin, Giants, Humanoids and Undead.

110301.name_enus: Evil is a Point of View
110301.description_enus: Your Turn Evil now also affects Humanoids and Beasts.

85804.description_enus: Your successful Judgments [Holy Insight: generate a charge of Holy Power and]reduce the cast time and mana cost of your next Flash of Light [Denounce: Divine Light, or Holy Radiance] by 35% per stack and improves its effectiveness by 20% per stack when used to heal others. Stacks up to 3 times.

114163.description_enus:
Consumes up to 3 Holy Power to place a protective Holy flame on a friendly target, which heals them for 5538.5 and an additional (711 * 1) every 3 sec for 30 sec. Healing increased per charge of Holy Power. The heal over time is increased by 50% if used on the Paladin.

Replaces Word of Glory. [Mastery: Illuminated Healing: While inside of an Arena or Battleground, periodic healing from this spell is increased by 40% but it does not cause Illuminated Healing]

20925.description_enus:
Protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 30 sec. The shield absorbs up to [ Holy: (240 + 0.819 * spellpower) /

Protection, Retribution
[(240 + 0.819 * spellpower) / 0.7]] damage every 6 sec.

Can be active only on one target at a time.

114039.description_enus: Places a Hand on the friendly target, reducing damage taken by 10% and damage from harmful periodic effects by an additional 80% (less for some creature attacks) for 6 sec. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time.<!--cooldown:105622:6 sec cooldown-->

114154.description_enus: Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection and Lay on Hands by 50%.

105622.description_enus: You can use Hand of Freedom, Hand of Protection, Hand of Sacrifice and Hand of Salvation twice each before incurring their cooldowns.

105809.description_enus: Abilities that generate Holy Power will deal 30% additional damage and healing, and generate 3 charges of Holy Power for the next 18 sec.

53376.description_enus:
Avenging Wrath lasts 50% longer and grants more frequent access to one of your abilities while it lasts.

Holy
Reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 50% and increases the critical strike chance of Holy Shock by 20%.

Protection
Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 50%, and causes Judgment to generate one additional Holy Power. Avenging Wrath also increases healing received by 20%.

Retribution
Reduces the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath by 50%.

86172.description_enus:
Abilities that cost Holy Power have a 25% chance to cause the Divine Purpose effect.

Divine Purpose
Your next Holy Power ability will consume no Holy Power and will cast as if 3 Holy Power were consumed. Lasts 8 sec.

114165.description_enus:
Sends a beam of light toward a target, turning them into a prism for Holy energy.

If an enemy is the prism, they take 16136.5 Holy damage and radiate 10881.5 healing to 5 nearby allies within 15 yards.

If an ally is the prism, they are healed for 16136.5 and radiate 10881.5 Holy damage to 5 nearby enemies within 15 yards.

114158.description_enus:
Hurl a Light-infused hammer into the ground, where it will blast a 10 yard area with Arcing Light for 14 sec.

Arcing Light
Deals 3630.5 Holy damage to enemies and reduces their movement speed by 50% for 2 sec. Heals allies for 3630.5 every 2 sec.

114157.description_enus:
A hammer slowly falls from the sky, causing (spellpower * 5936 / 1000 + 26.72716306 * 486) Holy damage over 10 sec. This damage is dealt slowly at first and increases over time, culminating in a final burst of damage. Dispelling the effect triggers the final burst.

Stay of Execution
If used on friendly targets, the falling hammer heals the target for (spellpower * 5936 / 1000 + 26.72716306 * 486) healing over 10 sec. This healing is dealt slowly at first and increases over time, culminating in a final burst of healing. Dispelling the effect triggers the final burst.

109215.description_enus: Your Disengage frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.

109298.description_enus: When you Disengage, you also activate a web trap which encases all targets within 8 yards in sticky webs, preventing movement for 8 sec.

118675.description_enus: Reduces the cooldown of Disengage by 10 sec, and the cooldown of Deterrence by 60 sec.

109248.description_enus:
You fire a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yards of the landing arrow for 10 sec.

If targets move 5 yards from the arrow they are stunned for 5 sec (3 sec PvP) and will be immune to the effects of Binding Shot for 10 sec.

19386.description_enus: A stinging shot that puts the target to sleep for 30 sec.  Any damage will cancel the effect.  Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on the target at a time.

19577.description_enus: Command your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 3 sec.
