109304.description_enus: Instantly heals you for 30% and your pet for 100% of total health.

109260.description_enus:
The Hunter takes on the aspects of an iron hawk, increasing ranged attack power by 35%, and reducing all damage taken by 10%. Only one Aspect can be active at a time.

Replaces Aspect of the Hawk.

109212.description_enus: While your pet is active, you and your pet will regenerate 3% of total health every 2 sec.

82726.description_enus: Instantly restores 50 Focus to you and your pet and an additional 50 Focus over 10 sec.

120679.description_enus: Summons a powerful wild beast to attack your target for 15 sec.  Each time the beast deals damage, you will gain 5 Focus.

109306.description_enus: You have a 30% chance when you fire a ranged attack that costs Focus or Kill Command to reduce the Focus cost of your next 3 Arcane Shots or Multi-Shots by 20.

131894.description_enus: Summons a flock of crows to attack your target over the next 30 sec.  If used on a target below 20% health, the cooldown is reduced to 60 seconds.

130392.description_enus: Your pet's Basic Attacks deal 50% increased damage, can now be used from 30 yards away, and will instantly teleport them behind their target.

120697.description_enus:
Your pet rapidly charges from target to target, attacking 9 times over 4 sec. Each attack causes the target to bleed for (86 * 5) damage over 15 sec, stacking up to 9 times.

The pet must be within 10 yards of the target to Lynx Rush.

117050.description_enus:
You hurl two glaives toward a target, each dealing 872.5 damage to each enemy struck and reducing movement speed by 30% for 3 sec. The primary target will take 4 times as much damage from each strike.

The Glaives will return back to you, damaging and snaring targets again as they return.

109259.description_enus:
You wind up a powerful shot, which deals 600% weapon damage to the target and 300% weapon damage to all enemies in between you and the target.

Enemies hit by Powershot are also knocked back.

120360.description_enus:
Rapidly fire a spray of shots forward for 3 sec, dealing a total of 640% weapon damage to the enemy target and an average of 320% weapon damage to each other enemy target in front of you.

Useable while moving.

14062.description_enus: Increases your movement speed while stealthed by 20%, and the damage your abilities deal while stealthed by 50%.

108208.description_enus: Your Stealth breaks 3 sec after dealing or receiving hostile actions, rather than doing so immediately.

108209.description_enus: Abilities cost 75% less Energy while you are stealthed.

108210.description_enus: A successful Kidney Shot or Cheap Shot also reduces the damage dealt by the target by 50% (25% on player targets) and healing done by the target by 10% for 6 sec after the effect fades.

74001.description_enus:
Enter into a state of heightened awareness, deflecting enemy weapon strikes with increasing effectiveness. Successive attacks will deal 10% less damage per application, stacking 5 times.

Lasts for 20 sec, but if 10 sec elapse without any incoming weapon strikes, this state will end.

31230.description_enus: An attack that would otherwise be fatal will instead reduce you to no less than 10% of your maximum health, and damage taken will be reduced by 85% for 3 sec.  This effect cannot occur more than once per 90 seconds.

108211.description_enus:
Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Your melee attacks have a 50% chance to poison the target for 10 sec. Your subsequent weapon strikes against the poisoned target will heal you for 10% of damage dealt. [Shiv: Shiv Effect:
Instantly restores 5% of the Rogue's health]

79008.description_enus: Your Feint ability also reduces all damage taken by 30% for 5 sec.

138106.description_enus: Your Ambush, Garrote, and Cheap Shot abilities can now be used from 40 yards away, and will cause you to appear behind your target.

36554.description_enus: Step through the shadows and appear behind a target.  Movement speed is increased by 70% for 2 sec afterwards.

108212.description_enus: Increases movement speed by 70% for 4 sec and removes any movement-slowing effects. Does not break stealth.

131511.description_enus: When you disable an enemy with Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Gouge, Sap, or Blind, they suffer 10% increased damage from all sources for the duration of the effect.

108215.description_enus:
Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 20% chance of poisoning the enemy for 15 sec. Stacks up to 4 times on a single target, and upon a fourth application, the enemy will be stunned for 4 seconds. [Shiv: Shiv Effect:
Causes instant paralysis of an enemy's lower body, rooting them in place for 4 sec]

108216.description_enus: Your Gouge and Blind no longer have an Energy cost, and no longer break from damage dealt by your Poison and Bleed effects.

114014.description_enus:
A ranged attack that deals 2493 Physical damage to an enemy target. If the enemy is farther than 10 yards away, your autoattacks will be replaced with ranged shuriken for up to 10 sec, granting them a 30 yd range. Shurikens are coated in your Lethal Poison. Awards 1 combo point.

Replaces Throw.

137619.description_enus: Mark the target, instantly generating 5 combo points on them. If the target dies within 1 min Marked for Death's cooldown is reset.

114015.description_enus:
When one of your attacks generates a combo point on a target that already has 5 combo points, you gain an Anticipation charge, up to a maximum of 5.

When you perform an offensive finishing move on an enemy, any Anticipation charges are consumed to grant you an equal number of combo points on that target.

108920.description_enus: Summons Shadowy tendrils out of the ground, rooting up to 5 enemy targets within 8 yards of the caster for 20 sec. Killing the tendril will cancel the effect.

108921.description_enus:
Summons a Psyfiend that stands in place for 10 sec. The Psyfiend casts a Psychic Terror on a nearby enemy within 20 yards every 2 sec, preferring anything attacking the Priest.

Psychic Terror causes enemies to [Glyph of Psychic Scream: tremble in place / flee] for 30 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

605.description_enus: Controls a mind up to level 4 for 30 sec.  Does not work versus Mechanical beings.

64129.description_enus: When you cast Power Word: Shield or Leap of Faith, you increase the target's movement speed by 60% for 4 sec.

121536.description_enus:
Place a feather at the target location. If allies walk through it, they gain 80% increased movement speed for 6 sec.

Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time. Accumulates an additional charge once every 10 sec. Maximum 3 charges.

108942.description_enus: When you Fade, you remove all movement impairing effects from yourself, and your movement speed is unhindered for 5 sec.

109186.description_enus:
Discipline, Holy:
Surge of Light
You have a 15% chance when you Smite or cast a healing spell to cause your next Flash Heal to be instant cast and have no mana cost. Limit 2 charges.

Shadow:
Surge of Darkness
Periodic damage from your Vampiric Touch has a 20% chance to cause your next Mind Spike to not consume your damage-over-time effects, become instant cast, cost no mana, and deal 50% additional damage. Limit 2 charges.

123040.description_enus:
Creates a Mindbender to attack the target. Caster receives 1.75% mana when the Mindbender attacks. Lasts 15 sec.

Replaces Shadowfiend.

139139.description_enus:
Discipline, Holy:
You gain the Power Word: Solace ability.

Shadow:
Casting Mind Flay while your target is affected by your Devouring Plague causes your Mind Flay to deal 33% additional damage per orb consumed by Devouring Plague.


Power Word: SolaceLevel 90
30 yd range
Instant10 sec cooldown
Requires Priest
Requires level 1
Strike an enemy with the power of the heavens, dealing 1072to_lc1201 Holy damage and an additional 399 Holy damage over 7 sec and restoring 1% of maximum mana.

Damage dealt by Power Word: Solace will instantly heal a nearby low health friendly target within 40 yards from the enemy target for 100% of the damage dealt (50% when healing the Priest).

Replaces Holy Fire.

19236.description_enus: Instantly heals the caster for 30% of their total health.

112833.description_enus: Your shadow blurs into the darkness, leaving your true form behind. As a shadow you are stealthed, but remain in combat. Lasts 6 sec or until your true form is hit by 3 direct attacks.

108945.description_enus:
Anytime a damaging attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 20% of your total health lasting for 20 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

109142.description_enus: After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, you deal 15% increased damage and healing for 10 sec.

10060.description_enus: Infuses the Priest with power, increasing spell haste by 20%, all damage by 5%, and reducing the mana cost of all spells by 20%. Lasts 20 sec.

109175.description_enus:
Discipline:
When you cast Penance, there is a 100% chance your next Power Word: Shield will both ignore and not cause the Weakened Soul effect.

Holy:
When you cast Greater Heal or Prayer of Healing, there is a 40% chance your next Prayer of Mending will not trigger its cooldown, and will jump to each target instantly.

Shadow:
Periodic damage from your Shadow Word: Pain has a 5% chance to reset the cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast within 12 sec to be instant cast and cost no mana.

121135.description_enus:
Launches a Holy bolt at the target that grows in power as it travels, which causes (12592 * 0.4) to 12592 Holy damage to an enemy, or (12592 * 0.4) to 12592 healing to an ally.

This effect can bounce from allies to other allies, or from enemies to other enemies. Each time it bounces it will split into 2 bolts, preferring farther away targets, and never hitting the same target twice. Cascade can bounce up to 4 times.

110744.description_enus:
Fires a Divine Star in front of you, traveling 24 yds, causing 4716.5 Divine damage to all enemies and 7861.5 healing to all allies within 4 yds of its path.

After reaching its destination it will return to you, also dealing damage and healing to all targets in its path.

120517.description_enus: Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands and grows in power, up to 30 yds away. Deals up to (<!--pts2:0:0:120692-->20216.5<!----> * 0.1) to <!--pts2:2:0:120692-->25270<!----> Holy damage to enemies, and up to (<!--pts1:0:0:120692-->33694<!----> * 0.1) to <!--pts1:2:0:120692-->42117<!----> healing to allies, with the greatest effect at 25 yds.

108170.description_enus: Your Blood Boil ability now also triggers Pestilence if it strikes a diseased target.

123693.description_enus: Draw forth the infection from an enemy, consuming your Blood Plague and Frost Fever diseases on the target to activate two random fully-depleted runes as Death Runes.

115989.description_enus: Surrounds the Death Knight with a vile swarm of unholy insects for 10 sec, stinging all enemies within 10 yards every 1 sec, infecting them with Blood Plague and Frost Fever.

49039.description_enus: Draw upon unholy energy to become undead for 10 sec.  While undead, you are immune to Charm, Fear, and Sleep effects, and Death Coil will heal you.

51052.description_enus: Places a large, stationary Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage done to party or raid members inside it by 40%.  The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 3 sec.

114556.description_enus:
An unholy pact grants you the ability to fight on through damage that would kill mere mortals. When you would sustain fatal damage, you instead are wrapped in a Shroud of Purgatory, absorbing incoming healing equal to the amount of damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.

If any healing absorption remains when Shroud of Purgatory expires, you die. Otherwise, you survive. This effect may only occur every 3 min.

96268.description_enus:
You passively move 10% faster, and movement-impairing effects may not reduce you below 70% of normal movement speed.

When activated, you gain 30% movement speed and may not be slowed below 100% of normal movement speed for 6 seconds.

50041.description_enus: Victims of your Frost Fever disease are Chilled, reducing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec, and your Chains of Ice immobilizes targets for 3 sec.

108194.description_enus:
Lifts an enemy target off the ground and crushes their throat with dark energy, stunning them for 5 sec. Functions as a silence if the target is immune to stuns.

Replaces Strangulate.

48743.description_enus: Drain vitality from an undead minion, healing the Death Knight for 50% of <dfn title="her">his</dfn> maximum health and causing the minion to suffer damage equal to 50% of its maximum health.

108196.description_enus: Deal <!--pts1:0:0:108196-->8225.5<!----> Shadowfrost damage to an enemy, healing the Death Knight for 150% of damage dealt.

119975.description_enus: Continuously converts Runic Power to health, restoring 3% of maximum health every 1 sec. Only base Runic Power generation from spending runes may occur while Conversion is active. This effect lasts until canceled, or Runic Power is exhausted.

45529.description_enus: Each Death Coil, Frost Strike, or Rune Strike generates 2 Blood Charges, up to a maximum of 12 charges.  Blood Tap consumes 5 Blood Charges to activate a random fully-depleted rune as a Death Rune.

81229.description_enus: When you land a damaging Death Coil, Frost Strike, or Rune Strike, you have a 45% chance to activate a random fully-depleted rune.

51462.description_enus: When you land a damaging Death Coil, Frost Strike, or Rune Strike, you have a 45% chance to activate Runic Corruption, increasing your rune regeneration rate by 100% for 3 sec.

108199.description_enus: Shadowy tendrils coil around all enemies within 20 yards of a target (hostile or friendly), pulling them to the target's location.

108200.description_enus: Surrounds the Death Knight with a swirling tempest of frigid air for 8 sec, chilling enemies within 8 yards every 1 sec. Each pulse reduces targets' movement speed by 15% for 3 sec, stacking up to 5 times. Upon receiving a fifth application, an enemy will be stunned for 6 sec.

108201.description_enus: Corrupts the ground in a 8 yard radius beneath the Death Knight for 10 sec. While standing in this corruption, the Death Knight is immune to effects that cause loss of control. This ability instantly removes such effects when activated.

30884.description_enus: Whenever a damaging attack brings you below 30% health, your maximum health is increased by 25% for 10 sec, and your threat level towards the attacker is reduced.  This effect cannot occur more often than once every 30 sec.

108270.description_enus: Summons an Earth Totem with [Glyph of Totemic Vigor: 15 / 10]% of the caster's health at the feet of the caster for 30 sec that grants the caster a shield absorbing (spellpower * 0.875 * 4) damage for 10 sec, and up to an additional (spellpower * 0.875) every 5 sec thereafter.

108271.description_enus: Seek haven by shifting partially into the elemental planes, reducing damage taken by 40% for 6 sec.

63374.description_enus: Your Frost Shock now also roots the target in ice for 5 sec.

51485.description_enus:
Summons an Earth Totem with [Glyph of Totemic Vigor: 5% of the caster's / 5] health at the feet of the caster for 20 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, causing roots to ensnare the legs of all enemies within 10 yards for 5 sec, preventing movement. Enemies that have already been rooted once by the totem will instead have their movement speed reduced by 50%.

Replaces Earthbind Totem.

108273.description_enus: Summons an Air Totem with [Glyph of Totemic Vigor: 5% of the caster's / 5] health at the feet of the caster for 6 sec, granting raid members within 40 yards immunity to movement-impairing effects.

108285.description_enus: When activated, immediately finishes the cooldown on all totems with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.

108284.description_enus:
Summoning a second totem of the same element no longer causes the first totem to be destroyed.

Only one totem may benefit from this effect at a time. Does not affect Fire totems.

108287.description_enus: Relocates your active totems to the specified location.

16166.description_enus: Call upon elemental forces, empowering you with 30% haste for 20 sec.

16188.description_enus:
Your next Nature spell with a base casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.

Passive:
Increases spell haste by 5% and melee haste by 10%.

108283.description_enus: When one of your spells causes direct damage or healing, you have a chance to gain Echo of the Elements, duplicating that spell's effect.

147074.description_enus: Your Healing Stream Totem now heals two targets at once for 15% additional healing.

108281.description_enus: When you deal direct damage or healing for the next 10 sec, 40% of damage or 60% of healing is copied as healing to up to 3 nearby injured party or raid members.

108282.description_enus:
When you cast Healing Wave, Greater Healing Wave, Healing Surge, or Chain Heal, your Healing Rain's duration is increased by 4.00 sec.

When you cast Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, [Elemental Blast: Elemental Blast]Earth Shock, or use Stormstrike, your Healing Rain's duration is increased by 4.00 sec.

This cannot cause Healing Rain to last longer than 40 sec.

117012.description_enus:
Your elemental weapon imbues are empowered, granting additional effects when triggered with Unleash Elements:

Flametongue Weapon
Increases the enemy target's damage taken from your Lightning Bolt by 30%, and from your Lava Burst by 10% for 10 sec.

Windfury Weapon
For 8 sec, your melee autoattacks can trigger Static Shock.

Earthliving Weapon
Further increases the effectiveness of your next single-target heal on the targeted ally by 50%.

Frostbrand Weapon
You leech heat from the enemy target, gaining 50% movement speed for 4 sec.

Rockbiter Weapon
You take 40% reduced damage from the enemy target for 5 sec.

117013.description_enus: Your Earth and Fire Elemental Totems draw forth powerful primal elementals directly from the elemental planes.  These servitors are 80% more powerful than regular elementals, act as pets directly under your control, and gain additional abilities.

117014.description_enus: Harness and direct the raw power of the elements towards an enemy target, dealing 4725.5 Elemental damage and increasing the caster's [ Enhancement: Agility]Critical Strike, Haste, or Mastery by 3500 for 8 sec.

12043.description_enus:
When activated, your next Mage spell with a casting time less than 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell.

This spell is not on the global cooldown.

108843.description_enus:
Suppresses movement slowing effects and increases your movement speed by 150% for 1.50 sec.

This spell may be cast while a cast time spell is in progress and is not on the global cooldown.

108839.description_enus: Allows you to move while casting and channeling the next Mage spell that has a base cast or channel time less than 4 sec. This spell may be cast while a cast time spell is in progress and is not on the global cooldown, and accumulates up to 3 charges. Lasts 15 sec.

115610.description_enus: Envelops you in a temporal shield for 4 sec, reducing all damage taken by 15%. 100% of the damage taken while shielded will be healed back over 6 sec. This spell is usable while stunned, frozen, incapacitated, feared or asleep, and is not on the global cooldown.

140468.description_enus: Protects you with fiery energy, absorbing (<!--term-->firespellpower_stc<!--term--> * 15 / 100) damage from each attack against you (up to a maximum of 30% of the attack).

11426.description_enus: Instantly shields you, absorbing (<!--pts1:1:0:11426-->4580<!----> + <!--term-->frostspellpower_stc<!--term--> * 3.3) damage.  Lasts 1 min.  While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be delayed by damage.

113724.description_enus: Summons a Ring of Frost at the target location. Enemies entering the ring will become frozen for 10 sec. Lasts 10 sec. 10 yd radius. Limit 10 targets.

111264.description_enus: Places an Ice Ward on a friendly target. When an enemy strikes the target, all enemies within 10 yds will become frozen in place for 5 sec. 1 <!--singular:charge:charges-->charge<!--singular-->.  Lasts 30 sec.

102051.description_enus: Silences and freezes the target in place for 8 sec. Lasts half as long versus Player targets.  Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

110959.description_enus:
Instantly makes the caster invisible, reducing all threat, and removing two damage over time effects. While invisible, you are untargetable by enemies. Lasts 20 sec. [Glyph of Invisibility: You move 40% faster while invisible] Invisibility is cancelled if you perform any actions.

Damage taken is reduced by 90% while invisible and for 3 sec after coming out of invisibility.

Replaces Invisibility.

86949.description_enus:
An attack which would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 50% of your maximum health, and you will burn for 40% of your maximum health over the next 6 sec.

Cauterize cannot occur more than once every 2 min.

11958.description_enus:
When activated, this spell finishes the cooldown of your Ice Block, Frost Nova, and Cone of Cold spells, and heals you for 30% of your maximum health.

This spell is usable while stunned, frozen, incapacitated, feared or asleep, and is not on the global cooldown.

114923.description_enus: Places a Nether Tempest on the target which deals <!--pts1:3:12:114923-->3900<!----> Arcane damage over 12 sec. Each time Nether Tempest deals damage, an additional 50% of that damage is also dealt to a random target within 10 yards. This spell is strongest when applied to 3 or 4 targets.

44457.description_enus:
The target becomes a Living Bomb, taking 4288 Fire damage over 12 sec. When this effect ends, or the target dies, it explodes to deal an additional [(0.1) * 4288] Fire damage to the target and all other enemies within 10 yards. Limit 3 targets. This spell is strongest when applied to 1 or 2 targets.

This spell has a 1.0 sec global cooldown.

112948.description_enus: Places a Frost Bomb on the target.  After 4 sec, the bomb explodes, dealing <!--pts1:0:0:113092-->4600<!----> Frost damage to the primary target, and <!--pts2:0:0:113092-->2301<!----> Frost damage to all other targets within 10 yds.  All affected targets are slowed by 70% for 2 sec. Frost Bomb's countdown and cooldown are reduced by haste. This spell is strongest when it can hit 5 or more targets with the explosion.

114003.description_enus:
Removes Evocation's cooldown and reduces its channel period and duration by 50%.

Completing an Evocation causes you to deal 15% increased spell damage, but passively regenerate 50% less mana, for 1 min.

116011.description_enus:
Places a Rune of Power on the ground, which lasts for 1 min. While standing within 5 yds of your own Rune of Power, your mana regeneration is increased by 75% and your spell damage is increased by 15%. Only 2 Runes of Power can be placed at one time. [Glyph of Evocation: While standing in your own Rune of Power, you gain 1% of your maximum health per second]

Replaces Evocation.

1463.description_enus:
Places a magical ward on you, absorbing up to (1041 + spellpower * 1.0) damage for 8 sec. Absorbed damage will restore up to 18% of your maximum mana.

When this effect ends, you gain up to 15% increased spell damage for 25 sec, based on the absorption used.

Passive:
Increases spell damage by 6% and increases mana regeneration by 65%. This effect is deactivated while Incanter's Ward is on cooldown.

108359.description_enus: Restores 30% of you and your pet's maximum health and increases all healing received by 25% over 12 sec.

108370.description_enus: Your [ Affliction: Malefic Grasp, Drain Soul, Fel Flame or Haunt spell] [ Demonology: Shadow Bolt, Soul Fire, Fel Flame and Touch of Chaos spells] [ Destruction: Incinerate, Fel Flame, Shadowburn, and Chaos Bolt spells] grant you and your pet a shadowy shield that absorbs [ Affliction: 20%] [ Demonology, Destruction: 10%] of the damage dealt for 15 sec.

108371.description_enus: Increases the damage of your Drain Life spell by 50% and the healing of your Drain Life spell by 150%.

47897.description_enus: Sends a cone of dark energy before you, reducing the movement speed by 50% of all enemy targets within 10 yards for 6 sec.

6789.description_enus: Causes the enemy target to run in horror for 3 sec. The caster restores 15% of their maximum health.

30283.description_enus: Shadowfury is unleashed, stunning all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.

108415.description_enus: 20% of all damage taken is split with your summoned demon. Additionally, 3% of all damage you deal is converted to healing on you and your summoned demon.

108416.description_enus:
Your demon sacrifices 25% of its current health to shield its master for 400% of the sacrificed health. Lasts 20 sec.

If you have no demon, your health is sacrificed instead. Can be cast while suffering from control impairing effects. [The Codex of Xerrath: "Let someone else pay the price of your recklessness." -Zelfrax ]

110913.description_enus:
Prevents all damage for 8 sec.

When the shield fades, 50% of the damage prevented is dealt over 8 sec. Can be cast while suffering from control impairing effects. [The Codex of Xerrath: "All debts must be repaid... eventually." - Shinfel]

111397.description_enus: While active, any time an enemy melee attack deals damage to the Warlock, the enemy will run in horror for up to 4 sec. 1 charge. Blood Horror lasts 1 min.

111400.description_enus:
Drains 4% of your maximum health per second to increase your movement speed by 50%. During Burning Rush, movement-impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed.

Lasts until cancelled.

108482.description_enus: Purge all Magic effects, movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character or demon. [The Codex of Xerrath: "I will not be stopped - be it by Human, Dragon or Titan." - Ritssyn]

108499.description_enus:
You command stronger demons, replacing your normal minions. These demons deal 20% additional damage and have more powerful abilities.

Spells Learned:
Summon Fel Imp
Summon Voidlord
Summon Shivarra
Summon Archincubus
Summon Observer [ Demonology: Summon Wrathguard]
Summon Abyssal
Summon Terrorguard

108501.description_enus:
Instantly summon a second demon, who fights for 20 sec. The demon will instantly use one of their special abilities when summoned:

Grimoire: Imp: Immediately cleanses a hostile magic effect from their master.
Grimoire: Voidwalker Immediately taunts their target when summoned.
Grimoire: Succubus Immediately seduces their target if it is Humanoid.
Grimoire: Incubus Immediately seduces their target if it is Humanoid.
Grimoire: Felhunter Immediately interrupts their target when summoned. [ Demonology: Grimoire: Felguard Immediately stuns their target when summoned]

108503.description_enus:
You sacrifice your demon to gain one of its abilities, increase the power of many of your single target spells by [ Affliction: 20] [ Demonology: 25] [ Destruction: 15]% [Soul Link: increase your maximum health by 20%] and regenerate 2% of maximum health every 5 sec. Lasts for 1 hour.

Summoning another demon cancels the effect.

108505.description_enus: Your Dark Soul spells have two charges.

137587.description_enus: You can cast Malefic Grasp, Incinerate and Shadow Bolt while moving.

108508.description_enus: Increases the area of your area of effect by 500% and damage by 100% of your Seed of Corruption, Hellfire, Immolation Aura and Rain of Fire for 10 sec.

115173.description_enus: Allows you to Roll and Chi Torpedo more often, increases their maximum number of charges by 1, and reduces their cooldown by 5 sec.

116841.description_enus: Instantly clears the target of all immobilizing and movement impairing effects, and increases their movement speed by 70% for 6 sec.

115174.description_enus: Every time you Roll or Chi Torpedo, your movement speed is increased by 25% for 10 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.

115098.description_enus:
You cause a wave of Chi energy to flow through friend and foe, dealing [493 + 1 * (attackPower) * 0.45 * 1] Nature damage or [493 + (attackPower) * 0.45] healing. Bounces up to 7 times to the nearest targets within 25 yards.

When bouncing to allies, Chi Wave will prefer those injured over full health.

124081.description_enus:
Forms a Zen Sphere above the target, healing the target for [114 + (attackPower) * 0.104] and dealing [114 + 1 * (attackPower) * 0.104 * 1] Nature damage to the nearest enemy within 10 yards of the target every 2 sec for 16 sec. Only two Zen Spheres can be summoned at any one time.

If the target of the Zen Sphere reaches 35% or lower health or if the Zen Sphere is dispelled or expires it will detonate, dealing [463 + 1 * (attackPower) * 0.423 * 1] Nature damage and [294 + (attackPower) * 0.269] healing to all targets within 10 yards.

123986.description_enus:
You summon a torrent of Chi energy and hurl it forward, up to 40 yds, dealing [1325 + 1 * (attackPower) * 1.21 * 1] Nature damage to all enemies, and [1095 + (attackPower) * 1.00] healing to all allies in its path. Chi Burst will always heal the Monk.

While casting Chi Burst, you continue to dodge, parry, and auto-attack.

121817.description_enus:
Every 20 sec, you gain Power Strikes, causing your next Jab, Soothing Mist, Spinning Crane Kick, Expel Harm, or Crackling Jade Lightning to generate 1 additional Chi.

If you are already at maximum Chi, a Chi Sphere will be summoned near you.

115396.description_enus: Increases your maximum Chi by 1, your maximum mana by 15%, and your energy regen by 15%.

115399.description_enus: Instantly restores 2 Chi, and generates [Fists of Fury: 2 stacks of Tigereye Brew] [Keg Smash: 5 stacks of Elusive Brew / 2 stacks of Mana Tea]. Maximum 2 charges.

116844.description_enus: Forms a sanctuary around the friendly target, instantly silencing all enemies for 3 sec and disarming them for 4 sec. In addition, enemies within the Ring of Peace who attack or cast harmful spells will be disarmed for an additional 4 sec or silenced for an additional 3 sec. Ring of Peace lasts for 8 sec.

119392.description_enus: A mighty Ox effigy rushes forward 30 yards in front of you, stunning all enemies within its path for 3 sec.

119381.description_enus: You knock down all enemies within 5 yards, effectively stunning them for 5 sec.

122280.description_enus:
Every 18 sec, you gain Healing Elixirs.

Healing Elixirs heals you for 15% of your total health the next time a damaging attack brings you below 35% of your maximum health, or you drink a Brew or Tea while injured.

122278.description_enus:
You dampen the damage from the most harmful attacks done to you. The next 3 attacks within 45 sec that deal damage equal to 20% or more of your total health are reduced by half.

Dampen Harm can be cast while stunned.

122783.description_enus: Reduces all spell damage taken by 90% and clears all magical effects on you, reversing them back to their original caster if within 40 yards if possible. Lasts for 6 sec.

123904.description_enus:
Invokes the White Tiger Celestial, summoning an effigy at the command of the caster. The effigy will assist you, attacking your primary target and also inflicting tiger lightning every 1 sec to 3 nearby enemies within 10 yards dealing (0.2525 * attackPower + 322) damage. Lasts for 45 sec.

Brewmaster
Xuen will also taunt the target, forcing it to attack him.

115008.description_enus:
Torpedo a distance in front of you, dealing 2069 Nature damage to all enemies and [8408 + (attackPower * .385)] healing to all allies in your path.

Chi Torpedo replaces Roll, and travels farther than Roll.

102280.description_enus: Teleports the Druid up to 20 yards forward, activates Cat Form, and increases movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.

102401.description_enus: Fly to a nearby ally's position.

145108.description_enus: Every 5 sec, heals you for 5% of your maximum health.  If you are at full health, the most injured nearby ally will be healed instead.

108238.description_enus: Instantly heals the Druid for 30% of maximum health.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

102351.description_enus: Protects a friendly target, causing any damage taken to heal the target for <!--pts1:0:0:102352-->12349<!----> every 2 sec for 6 sec.  Gaining the healing effect consumes the Cenarion Ward.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.  Lasts 30 sec.

106707.description_enus:
Grants an improved version of Faerie Fire that also reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

This talent replaces Faerie Fire.

102359.description_enus: Roots your target in place for 20 sec and spreads to additional nearby enemies.  Damage caused may interrupt the effect.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

132469.description_enus: Summons a violent Typhoon that strikes targets in front of the caster within 30 yards, knocking them back and dazing them for 6 sec.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

114107.description_enus:
Aessina's blessing grants a benefit which varies by your combat specialization.

Balance
Your Wrath, Starfire, and Starsurge casts have a 8% chance to cause your next Astral Communion to instantly grant 100 Lunar or Solar Power.

Feral
Your finishing moves grant 4 Energy per combo point.

Guardian
Mangle (Bear) now generates 30% more Rage and deals 15% more damage.

Restoration
You gain 100% haste for your next spell when you cast Swiftmend.

106731.description_enus:
Grants a superior shapeshifting form appropriate to your specialization for 30 sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this form for the duration of Incarnation.

Balance: Chosen of Elune
Improved Moonkin Form that gains 25% increased Arcane and Nature damage while Eclipse is active.

Feral: King of the Jungle
Improved Cat Form that allows the use of all abilities which normally require stealth, allows the use of Prowl while in combat, and removes the positional requirement of Ravage.

Guardian: Son of Ursoc
Improved Bear Form that reduces the cooldown on melee damage abilities and Growl to 1.5 sec.

Restoration: Tree of Life
Tree of Life Form that increases healing done by 15%, increases armor by 120%, and enhances Lifebloom, Wild Growth, Regrowth, and Entangling Roots spellcasts.

106737.description_enus:
Summons a Treant to assist in the Druid's current combat role for 15 sec. Useable in all shapeshift forms.

Balance
Casts Wrath for [1930 + (spellpower * 0.375)]) to [2175 + (spellpower * 0.375)]) Nature damage every 2 sec and will cast Entangling Roots.

Feral
Melees for (2189 + attackPower / 14 * 2) Physical damage every 2 sec and will cast Entangling Roots and Rake.

Guardian
Melees for [(1 + attackPower / 14 * 2 * 0.75) * 0.2 + 1] Physical damage every 2 sec and will use Taunt.

Restoration
Heals a nearby injured ally for 3490 every 2.5 sec and will use Swiftmend.

99.description_enus: Invokes the spirit of Ursol to roar, disorienting all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.  Any damage caused will remove the effect.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

102793.description_enus:
Conjures a vortex of wind at the destination location that reduces the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%.

The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center.

Lasts 10 sec. Useable in all shapeshift forms.

5211.description_enus: Invokes the spirit of Ursoc to stun the target for 5 sec.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

108288.description_enus:
Guardian (Hotfix Passive)
Increases Stamina, Agility, and Intellect by 6%.

When activated, increases all healing done and dramatically improves the Druid's ability to perform roles outside of their specialization for 45 sec. While not in an Arena or Battleground, shifting into Bear Form removes Heart of the Wild, and if the Druid was not recently in Bear Form, the cooldown is refunded 4 sec for every 1 sec of unused duration.

Grants the following benefits based on current specialization:

Non-Guardian
While in Bear Form, Agility, Expertise, Hit Chance, and armor bonuses increased, Vengeance granted, chance to be hit by melee critical strikes reduced.

Non-Feral
While in Cat Form, Agility, Hit Chance, and Expertise increased.

Non-Restoration
Mana cost of all healing spells reduced by 100%. Guardian Druids may also cast Rejuvenation while shapeshifted.

Non-Balance
Spell Damage and Hit Chance increased. Mana cost of all damage spells reduced by 100%.

Balance, Feral, Restoration
Increases Stamina, Agility, and Intellect by 6%.

When activated, increases all healing done and dramatically improves the Druid's ability to perform roles outside of their specialization for 45 sec. [ Guardian: While not in an Arena or Battleground, shifting into Bear Form removes Heart of the Wild, and if the Druid was not recently in Bear Form, the cooldown is refunded 4 sec for every 1 sec of unused duration]

Grants the following benefits based on current specialization:

Non-Guardian
While in Bear Form, Agility, Expertise, Hit Chance, and armor bonuses increased, Vengeance granted, chance to be hit by melee critical strikes reduced.

Non-Feral
While in Cat Form, Agility, Hit Chance, and Expertise increased.

Non-Restoration
Mana cost of all healing spells reduced by 100%. Guardian Druids may also cast Rejuvenation while shapeshifted.

Non-Balance
Spell Damage and Hit Chance increased. Mana cost of all damage spells reduced by 100%.

108373.description_enus:
Guardian (Hotfix Passive)
The Emerald Dream grants a benefit which varies by your combat specialization.

Balance
Increases healing from Healing Touch by 20% and casting Healing Touch increases the damage bonus of your next Eclipse by 35%.

Feral

While active, all single-target healing spells also damage a nearby enemy target for 25% of the healing done, and all single-target healing and damage spells and abilities also heal a nearby friendly target for 25% of the amount done.

76613.description_enus:

Up to 5 Icicles can be stored at once. Casting Ice Lance causes any Icicles to begin launching at the target.

117907.description_enus:
You have a 10% chance when you heal to summon a Healing Sphere nearby an injured ally for 30 sec. Allies who walk through the sphere will be healed for [((attackPower * 0.3517) + 9986)].

If the Healing Sphere expires before being used, an ally nearby within 6 yards of the sphere will be healed for 50% of the effect.
